title: Speedometer : Android Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: Speedometer shows speed in KPH or MPH. Perfect for when you jog or ride a bicycle.This app is for Android Wear. When wearable app is open, long-tap anywhere on screen to change speed unit.This app uses GPS to measure your speed.The speedometer's accuracy depends on the quality of the GPS signal.
descriptionHTML:
Speedometer shows speed in KPH or MPH. Perfect for when you jog or ride a bicycle.
This app is for Android Wear.
When wearable app is open, long-tap anywhere on screen to change speed unit.
This app uses GPS to measure your speed.
The speedometer's accuracy depends on the quality of the GPS signal.
comments: It Works The app is simple and works, but the refresh rate seems laggy. Other than that, it is a good app.
Straightforward Simple and gets the job done. I'd prefer a larger digital readout, though, for easier reading while biking.
Won't work It crashed my moto and it would never work.  Just a waste.  Don't fall for it.
This will not work with my moto 360
Awesome Looks good on my watch and works flawlessly. Used it during a bicycle ride,
Useful app! Especially when I'm jogging and biking! Thanks :>
